answers.answer: A prank done through code review.

helper.text: It's a framework giving us access to various tools and functions related to testing.

questions.title: I want to create an user before each test in a describe block. Which function do I use?

helper.text: All commands within a beforeEach function will be run before all other tests in the describe blocks.

questions.title: What are 'Fakes' in a testing environment?

answers.answer: A simpler implementation of a complex module for use in tests.
A test function that logs all calls to it during tests.

helper.text: An example of a 'Fakes' is a fake UserService that saves information in a map instead of a database.
Mock Service Worker is a library that can imitate an API server.
